    • Class Server extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • currentPlayer

          int currentPlayer
          Stores what the current player is in the game state.

        • draftCount

          int draftCount
          Counter to increment through drafted array.

        • drafted

          java.lang.String[] drafted
          Stores the name of every character who has been drafted.

        • gameLock

          java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock gameLock
          Lock to locks threads.

        • gameOver

          boolean gameOver
          True or false if the game still in progress.

        • outputArea

          javax.swing.JTextArea outputArea
          JTextArea nested in scroll pane.

        • players

          Server.Player[] players
          Array of all player threads.

        • playersConnected

          java.util.concurrent.locks.Condition playersConnected
          Contition to unlock threads.

        • runGame

          java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService runGame
          ExecutorService to manage all threads.

        • scroll

          javax.swing.JScrollPane scroll
          Scroll pane to show all messages to server log.

        • server

          java.net.ServerSocket server
          Server-side socket to connect clients.
